title: Best of The Herd for Apr 07, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Apr 07, 2020
description:
Aggressive people succeed in life and Brady was aggressive in going to Tampa Bay

Aaron Rodgers deserves to be on the all decade team but only because Russell Wilson was drafted in 2012

The NBA may have painted themselves into a corner because of social media

Tom Brady took some clear shots at Bill Belichick in his 2,500 word essay

Colin officially wins Jim Harbaugh argument 

Guest: Tua Tagovailoa, Alabama QB and Colin's favorite QB prospect 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
